Aldi to become the first supermarket to pay above the real Living Wage - Now the highest-paying supermarket in the UK, overtaking Lidl, with pay rise for 3k-strong workforce - From next month, Aldi staff will earn £8.53 ($10.6) per hour, raised to £9.75 ($12.2) per hour for those who live in London.
